name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_contract_mls_days
title: Within how many days after acceptance of this offer will you sign a listing agreement with a Real Estate Broker?
label: Broker Listing
description: It's important that you do this quickly.
tips: Starting the broker selection process early helps ensure you meet your sale timeline. Have potential brokers identified before making this commitment.
small_print: The broker must be licensed in the jurisdiction where your property is located. The listing agreement must meet all legal requirements.

internal.notes: Days to sign listing agreement with broker

contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_contract_mls_days

suggested.hint: It is important to do this quickly to show your commitment to selling the property.

contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.tooltip: Enter the number of days to sign with a broker
